Hello Tapeo!  Tonight was the first of what will likely be many visits.The menu was tantalizing, but not overwhelming.  We sampled about 5 dishes, and I already know what I want to try on my next visit.  we tried:Asparagus tempura with romesco sauce - excellent.  we spied:Leeks (confit?)... I don't remember the description... but it looked amazing.  will try next time.we tried: Broken eggs with Botiffara - too heavy as the last plate... good, but the least favorite of what was served.we spied:Fideus with cuttlefish - Joan is allergic to seafood... this is one I would try on my own.we tried:beef filets with chimichurri sauce - I would definitely get this again!Iberian pork ribs with honey glaze - delicious.Bombeta & Cod fritter - loved them... cheap too!Dessert of Chocolate with olive oil & bread - nice rich flavors.  Prices:  for the 2 of us, with 2 glasses of wine each, 5 plates, water and service - this came to about 60 Euros.  And the service couldn't have been any friendlier.  I will be back... and i'm bringing more friends.
